001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.test;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
004import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcException;
005
006import java.time.Duration;
007
008/**
009 * Test support functions intended to be mixed-in to Spock test specs
010 */
011public interface BTCTestSupport extends BitcoinClientAccessor {
012
013    /**
014     * Wait for the server to become ready and validate the Bitcoin network it is running on
015     * @param expectedNetwork The network the server is expected to be running on
016     */
017    default void serverReady(Network expectedNetwork) throws JsonRpcException {
018        Boolean ready = client().waitForServer(Duration.ofSeconds(60));   // Wait up to 1 minute
019        if (!ready) {
020            throw new RuntimeException("Timeout waiting for server");
021        }
022        // As soon as the server is ready we must initialize network parameters in the client (by querying them)
023        Network network = client().getNetwork();
024        if (!network.equals(expectedNetwork)) {
025            throw new IllegalStateException("Server reports unexpected Bitcoin network.");
026        }
027    }
028}
